title: OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL Earnings Results: $OII Reports Quarterly Earnings
text:
OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL ($OII) posted quarterly earnings results on Wednesday, April 23rd. The company reported earnings of $0.43 per share, beating estimates of $0.29 by $0.14. The company also reported revenue of $674,520,000, beating estimates of $657,817,373 by $16,702,627.
